name: Attendance User Sessions
description: The Attendance User Sessions Brightspace Data Set provides the result for each user's session in each register in your organization.

columns.name: SchemeSymbolId
columns.description: Unique scheme symbol identifier given to the user for the session.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date the symbol for the user in the session was last modified (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user who last modified the session. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the user session has been deleted.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.
